name: quick-ball
effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 4× on the first turn of a battle, but 1× any other time.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× (Gen V: 5×), but only on the first turn.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild encounter.
